changes: feat(blacklist-galleries): add Blacklisting galleries which hides them from user view
feat(ui): relocate Tag Management reset button inside Manage Tags modal
feat(ui): move Must Add Tags, Smart Tags, and Show Non-English controls into Tag Management section
feat(ui): center page management header text for improved visual alignment
refactor(settings): consolidate tag-related settings under unified Tag Management section
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.9.0
feat(find-alt): bypass Smart Tags in Find Alt button by navigating directly to search URL
refactor(settings): rename toggle labels to remove leading 'Enable' across settings UI
refactor(settings): update NFM popup label to 'Offline Favoriting'
feat(read-manga): add Show More button to load additional items on Read Manga page
docs(readme): align documentation with new toggle names and phrasing
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.8.0
feat(mark-as-read): defer marking when placeholder metadata present
feat(mark-as-read): poll justRead every 2 seconds until metadata is fetched
feat(ui): show info notification while fetching metadata for read marking
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.4
fix(smart-tags): only format as advanced when taxonomy or language matches
fix(tokenizer): preserve original tokens when not matched by taxonomy
feat(title-guard): skip single-word auto-formatting for likely titles (>=5 words or Japanese particles like ga/de/no/ni/wa)
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.3
fix(search): prevent spaces and empty tokens becoming advanced tags
fix(must-add): skip empty namespace values to avoid tag:""
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.2.1
perf(mobile): disable taxonomy prefetch and preload on mobile devices
feat(taxonomy): async on-demand lookups for smart tags on mobile
perf(taxonomy): short-lived mobile cache (60s TTL) to reduce repeated downloads
fix(smart-tags): replace direct artist checks with async helper
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.2
fix(perf): stop storing taxonomy in GM storage
feat(taxonomy): use GitHub raw taxonomy directly
cleanup(taxonomy): purge old cached taxonomy keys on upgrade
fix(ui): ambiguity prompt modal styled to match dark theme
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.1
feat(search): add Smart Tag auto-parameter for tag and language input
Automatically wraps plain tag or language text in advanced search syntax (e.g., tag:"..." and language:"...") when enabled.
feat(settings): add toggle to enable Smart Tag behavior
feat(taxonomy): load Smart Tag taxonomy from GitHub raw URL
perf(taxonomy): cache compressed byType payload locally for faster startup
fix(taxonomy): avoid JSONStorage size limits by switching to GitHub-hosted JSON
chore(version): bump userscript version to 9.7.0
fix(related-manga): Prevent infinite loading when no bookmarks and 'Replace Related Manga' is enabled.
feat(related-manga): Update text to 'More Like This (There were no Bookmarks that match this manga)' when no matching bookmarks are found.
fix(sync): Preserve original version number for other users' data during compression.
feat(sync): Implement data compression for sync data to reduce storage size and improve performance.
feat(sync): Ensure backward compatibility for sync data, allowing older uncompressed data to be processed correctly.
feat(sync): Maintain multi-user data separation and compression for individual users within the sync system.
feat(sync): Expanded syncable keys to include all user preferences and data for comprehensive synchronization.
fix(random-hentai): Implement retry mechanism with exponential backoff for 429 (Too Many Requests) errors, waiting 5s then 10s before retrying.
feat(random-hentai): Add support for multiple languages in random search preferences, allowing comma-separated language inputs.
fix(bookmarks): fix multiple bookmark removal in bookmark page
Fixed an issue where only the first bookmark could be removed properly, and subsequent removals would reappear after refresh
fix(read-manga): ensure recent reads are displayed correctly
Reverse the order of read galleries before slicing to ensure the most recently read manga are displayed when a limit is applied.
feat(read-manga): add configurable limit for read manga display
Add slider in settings to control maximum number of manga displayed on Read Manga page. Defaults to 100 with range from 10-500 to balance performance and usability.
feat(tooltips): add toggle for gallery caption tooltips and improve tooltip handling
Add new setting to enable/disable gallery caption tooltips
Make tooltip display conditional on setting value
Remove redundant bookmark hover tooltip CSS
Update tooltip-related functions to respect setting
feat(read-manga): add sorting functionality and enhance UI styling
Implement gallery sorting by recent/oldest read and ID order
Redesign read manga page with modern gradients and animations
Improve mobile responsiveness and control elements
feat(mark-as-read): enhance justRead processing and caching
Add checkAndApplyJustRead method to parse gallery objects from localStorage
Update cacheGalleryData to accept optional title and coverImageUrl parameters
Implement enhanced gallery data caching with metadata support

feat: Added justRead processing - now correctly parses gallery objects from localStorage, including title and cover image, and caches them for the Read Manga page. This feature works in collaboration with the `nhentaimangaloader` script.
feat: adjust element positions based on settings and UI state
- Update mark-as-read button position dynamically based on page numbers and alt version button visibility
- Add interval checks to adjust tag warning badges when alt version button is present
fix: update version to 9.0.1 and remove hover effect
fix: Remove gallery hover effect that was causing captions to appear under galleries

fix: English filter now accepts both 'English' and 'language:"english"' for backward compatibility
feat: Updated English Only button to use language:"english" for accuracy
feat: Updated tag search to use tag:"tagName" format
feat(changelog): Updated changelog URL to GitHub raw content
feat(sync): Added new keys to syncableKeys for comprehensive data synchronization
‚ú® NEW: Mobile UI - UUID input and buttons are now responsive on mobile devices
feat(sync): add auto-sync manager with manual trigger and status display
Implement AutoSyncManager class for scheduled data synchronization
Add manual sync trigger button and status display in UI
Include data change detection for immediate sync
Support exponential backoff retry on errors

feat(changelog): implement automatic changelog popup on version update
Store last seen script version in GM storage and compare on load.
Fetch changelog data from JSON and display updates when a new version is detected.
Enhance user experience with quick, non-intrusive update popups.
feat(bookmarks): add flip button to toggle between related and bookmarked manga
Add a new setting to enable a flip button that allows users to toggle between the original related manga and their bookmarked content.
The button is only visible when 'Replace Related Manga with Bookmarks' is enabled.
